arts.sum: On another day, the momentum probably swings in our favour and we go on and win the game. “It’s never ideal to concede early and it gives us a mountain to climb, especially away from home,” he admitted.

arts.ttl: West Ham United 4-1 Ipswich Town: Kieran McKenna's verdict
arts.oTtl: East Anglican Daily Times - Ispwich Town FC
arts.sum: With a four-game unbeaten run having come to an end heading into the second international break of the season, McKenna continued: "West Ham played differently than anyone we've played so far, to be honest. Obviously we conceded some poor goals at poor times in the game, that changed the momentum of the game, and it ends up a comfortable victory for West Ham.
